= Introduction =

The Fusion Chrtas have the ability to render charts in HTML 5. This features is very useful to be used in web application for desktop and iPhone/iPad at the same time. To enable this feature internally the fusion charts library use the highcharts library <a href="http://www.w3schools.com/">Visit W3Schools</a>
